SELECT (select cfirstid from fhdba.et_contract_b where pk_contract=p.pk_contract and rownum=1) as pkLongpro, p.pk_contract as pkContract, p.ntotalorigmny as amount, p.vdef37 as grossProfit, 1 as type, p.vdef2 billcode FROM fhdba.et_contract p
WHERE p.pk_contract in (select c.pk_contract from fhdba.et_contract_b c where c.cfirstid!='~') AND p.dr = 0 AND p. fpfstatusflag =1 AND p.frevisestatusflag =-1 AND p.fstatusflag =8 AND p.ctrantypeid ='1001D2100000001X2A1S'
UNION ALL
SELECT (select cfirstid from fhdba.ent_contract_b where pk_contract=p.pk_contract and rownum=1) as pkLongpro, p.pk_contract as pkContract, p.ntotalorigmny as amount, p.vdef37 as grossProfit, 2 as type, p.vbillcode billcode FROM
fhdba.ent_contract p WHERE p.pk_contract in (select c.pk_contract from fhdba.ent_contract_b c where c.cfirstid!='~') AND p.dr = 0 AND p. fpfstatusflag =1 AND p.frevisestatusflag =-1 AND p.fstatusflag =8 AND p.ctrantypeid ='1001D2100000001X2A2Y'
